text: This is a list of prime ministers of Chad since the formation of the post of Prime Minister of Chad in 1978 to its abolition in 2018. A total of seventeen people have served as Prime Minister of Chad (not counting one Acting Prime Minister). Additionally, one person, Delwa Kassiré Koumakoye, has served on two non-consecutive occasions. ==Key== ;Political parties * * * * * * * * ;Other factions * ;Status * ==List of officeholders== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" !
